data.title: The Benefits of eBooks
data.meta_description: Whether you're a student or instructor, with our eBooks you have the benefits and flexibility of having class materials when you need them.
data.text:
Why Choose American Red Cross eBooks?

The American Red Cross is one of the foremost leaders in health and safety training and preparedness. Whether youâ€™re a student or helping to teach others, you can have the flexibility of having your class materials at your fingertips when you need them, with our eBooks.

Add to your knowledge or help those around you to do so! American Red Cross eBooks feature:

Full color images and interactive videos to make learning fun and engaging.

Rollover definitions in the text to help you understand key bolded terms and phrases.

The ability to use your eBooks as you would printed books, allowing you to highlight, mark with a pen, annotate, or add sticky notes throughout.

Study questions at the end of each chapter to test retention of terms.

Skill sheets at the end of certain chapters, providing step-by-step instructions for performing each skill.

And much more!
